imdb.title: Fairy Tail: Fearî teiru
imdb.plot: Lucy, an aspiring Celestial Wizard, becomes a friend and ally to powerful wizards Natsu, Gray, and Erza, who are part of the (in)famous wizard guild, Fairy Tail.

episodes.title: The Lamia Scale Thanksgiving Festival
episodes.plot: Natsu and Happy is reunited with Lucy one year after the dissolution of the guild. The three raise Fairy Tail rebuilding and go on a journey to find friends.

episodes.title: Because I Love You
episodes.plot: The guild Orochi's Fin launched a night raid by releasing a large group of demons on the city of Margaret. Wendy and Sheria rushed through the sky to hit the enemy's main force.

episodes.title: Avatar
episodes.plot: Natsu, Lucy, Wendy, Happy and Chales meet with Juvia in Amefurashi Village and discovers that Gray disappeared.

episodes.title: Underground Fight
episodes.plot: The Guild of Black Wizards Avatar, plan a strategy of purification. In search of Gray's fate, Natsu, Lucy and Happy, who find the Guild location, will attempt to infiltrate in the enemy area.

episodes.title: Purification Strategy
episodes.plot: Believing that Zeref will appear at the location where several deaths will happen, the organization of the black magic, Avatar, will sacrifice an entire city. In order to stop the plan, Natsu and company run to the city of Malba.

episodes.title: Ikusa-Tsunagi
episodes.plot: The main members of the Fairy Tail are reunited and behind the Black Wizards of Avatar. But the priest of the sanctuary, Arlok, is determined to do something to carry out the purification strategy.

episodes.title: Memoirs
episodes.plot: About 400 years ago, a boy who lost his beloved family, continued his forbidden search and was cursed by the God Ankhseram.

episodes.title: The Seventh Guild Master
episodes.plot: After receiving Lucy's letters, the former's members of Fairy Tail, gathered in Magnolia for the rebirth of the guild and the rebuilding of the building.

episodes.title: Law of Space
episodes.plot: Under the command of Erza, the members who discovered the truth about the dissolution of the guild, go to the mainland Alvarez to help the sixth master of the guild, Makarov.

episodes.title: Emperor Spriggan
episodes.plot: Brandish, of Alvarez's Army, meets Natsu and company on the Caracole Island. Her power is so strong, that extinguishes the completely island. Meanwhile in Alvarez, the Emperor Spriggan returns to the Empire.

episodes.title: To The Land Abandoned by Gods
episodes.plot: The wizards met with Makarov and now have to escape from the Alvarez Empire. However, Azir, the King of the Desert and one of the Spriggan 12 is behind them.

episodes.title: Mavis and Zeref
episodes.plot: Mavis finally reveals the secrets of her past, including her connection with Fairy Tail, Zeref, and her own sin. The ever-turning gears of fate offer glimpses of hope, but also produce one final, tragic contradiction.

episodes.title: Fairy Heart
episodes.plot: The "miracle" that Mavis and Zeref create, has evolved into a powerful form of magic that must keep in secret. Mavis is still regretful for her sin, but the wizards of the guild try to cheer her up. The Alvarez Empire prepares to approach to Ishgar.

episodes.title: The Magnolia Defensive War
episodes.plot: Before the battle for Fairy Tail's existence begins, the guild members spend the final night in their own ways. But when Alvarez's vast army launches a surprise attack, Fairy Tail's bond of solidarity is put to the test.

episodes.title: Morning Star
episodes.plot: Fairy Tail allowed the Spriggan 12 to invade the city of Magnolia. Lucy comes face to face with Brandish, but gets nervous when she says a name.

episodes.title: This Parfum Goes To?
episodes.plot: Magnolia is threatened by another member of the Spriggan 12, Wall. Wall's next target is Fried, who is in Kardia Cathedral.

episodes.title: Natsu vs. Zeref
episodes.plot: Wizard guilds all across Fiore join Fairy Tail in the battle against Zeref's armies. Meanwhile, Natsu and Happy speed off to the west to defeat Zeref once and for all.

episodes.title: Across 400 Years
episodes.plot: Zeref, sensing his impending death, reveals the secret behind Natsu's birth. After learning the shocking truth, Natsu swings his fist one last time. Meanwhile, Fiore's wizard guilds begin to battle the Alvarez army and the Spriggan 12.

episodes.title: What I Want to Do
episodes.plot: While fierce fighting continued throughout Fiore, there was also a case in Magnolia's "Fairy Tail" guild. For the moment the crisis has left, Lucy listens to the voice of Brandish to hear the information of her mother, Leila. But for a moment, hands stained with hatred and anger approached Lucy.

episodes.title: Not Until the Battle is Over
episodes.plot: God Serena defeats the Four Emperors of Ishgar and brings the eastern battle to its apparent conclusion. Meanwhile, Gajeel, Erza, Laxus, and other Fairy Tail members depart for different locations to support the other guilds in battle.

episodes.title: In a Silent Time
episodes.plot: While fighting Wall, Laxus is incapacitated when his Bane Particle contamination reaches a critical level. To the east, Wendy and Shelia confront "Warrior Queen" Dimaria of the Spriggan 12, but are instantly overwhelmed.

episodes.title: Natsu, Revived!!
episodes.plot: Wendy is determined to use her Third Origin to defeat the powered-up Dimaria. But using it comes at a price: Wendy will never be able to use magic again. Meanwhile, another member of the Spriggan 12 singlehandedly attacks Fairy Tail's home base.

episodes.title: Historia of Corpses
episodes.plot: Jacob unleashes his true anger after Lucy and Natsu thwart his initial plans. Eventually, he targets the other Fairy Tail members trapped in his alternate dimension. Meanwhile, the Hargeon battlefield is blanketed in darkness as a new foe appears.

episodes.title: Mettle
episodes.plot: Neinhart produces Historias across the battlefield to plunge Hargeon into chaos. Past adversaries revive and attack the various guild members fighting to free the city. Erza struggles against three Historias at once, and soon finds herself immobilized.

episodes.title: The Third Seal
episodes.plot: Natsu's team heads east with Brandish to negotiate with August, the Wizard King. Meanwhile, Sabertooth and Blue Pegasus spring back into action after Gajeel's team saves them. But the reinvigorated heroes face yet another nightmare.

episodes.title: Together, Always
episodes.plot: Gajeel attempts to defeat the invulnerable Bloodman in a last-ditch effort to save Levy. Meanwhile, Natsu's team watches on as Brandish tries to negotiate with August. Elsewhere, Irene and Acnologia come face to face with each other.

episodes.title: Fairy Tail Zero
episodes.plot: Irene's Universe One spell reshapes the entire land of Fiore. All of the wizards from Ishgar are thrown into confusion, but they work together to make progress. Meanwhile, Mavis faces a new ordeal after she regains her physical form.

episodes.title: White Dragneel
episodes.plot: Mirajane defeats her two powerful adversaries, but is caught by Irene before there's time to celebrate. Elsewhere, the various Fairy Tail teams follow their own paths in order to save Mavis. But the enemy is fully prepared and waiting to stop them.

episodes.title: The Winter Wizard
episodes.plot: Gildarts makes a surprise return and confronts God Serena on the battlefield. Natsu and friends continue their push toward their guildhall, but soon realize how terrifying the Spriggan 12 truly are when they're fully assembled.

episodes.title: Gray and Juvia
episodes.plot: Invel takes control of Gray and Juvia's minds. Despite being close friends, the two are forced to loathe each other and fight to the death. As the fight progresses, Juvia listens to her feelings for Gray and resists in a way only she can.

episodes.title: The Mightiest Demon of the Book of Zeref
episodes.plot: Just as Gray learns E.N.D.'s true identity, Lucy faces off against Brandish. Lucy tries hard to avoid a fight, but her desperate pleas go unheard. With neither side willing to compromise, the ensuing battle triggers an all-new crisis.

episodes.title: Broken Bonds
episodes.plot: Natsu and gray clash together as gray finds out about E.N.D ... on the other side guild master makarov makes a mighty move!

episodes.title: Pleasure and Pain
episodes.plot: Erza's tears stop the fight between Gray and Natsu. Meanwhile, the remaining members of the Spriggan 12 commence a ferocious assault on Ishgar. August faces off against Crime Sorcière while Larcade unleashes an attack that affects friend and foe alike.

episodes.title: Natsu's Mind
episodes.plot: Sting rushes to help as Larcade continues his relentless attack on Kagura's group. Meanwhile, Natsu falls unconscious and wakes up inside his own mind. He then revisits lost memories that shed light on his past.

episodes.title: Sting, the White Shadow Dragon
episodes.plot: Sting absorbs Rogue's power and overwhelms Larcade with white and shadow magic. In response, Larcade unleashes the deadly Rest In Peace spell. Elsewhere, after an intense battle, Irene reveals a secret to Erza about her past.

episodes.title: Dragon Seed
episodes.plot: Irene shares the story of her past, including the secret of Erza's birth. She also reveals the origin of Dragon Slayer magic, her connection with Zeref, and the sad fate that Dragon Slayers bear. Meanwhile, Natsu continues his journey inside his mind.

episodes.title: Master Enchant
episodes.plot: Irene and Erza face each other in an epic battle. When Wendy assists Erza, Irene makes a sudden realization that spells instant doom for Wendy.

episodes.title: Dragon or Demon
episodes.plot: Irene unleashes Deus Sema, a power beyond human comprehension. With only her right arm, Erza combats the spell that threatens the entire area. Meanwhile, Natsu is forced to make an important decision that will forever change his fate.

episodes.title: Gray's Trump Card
episodes.plot: Magnolia reverts to its proper form after Irene's defeat. As retaliation, August prepares to destroy the town and everyone in it. Elsewhere, Gray reaches Zeref and is the first to learn about Zeref's true objective.

episodes.title: Dark Future
episodes.plot: Gray makes the ultimate choice to sacrifice his life and his very existence in order to trap Zeref in ice for all eternity. Meanwhile, the mighty Acnologia finally reaches Magnolia and causes great concern for both sides of the war.

episodes.title: My Name Is...
episodes.plot: August seeks to understand the love that is shared between parent and child. When he threatens to kill Cana, Gildarts responds with rage. Meanwhile, Natsu and Zeref continue their epic battle, but a new situation develops when Larcade arrives.

episodes.title: Compassion
episodes.plot: Larcade scowls in pain after Zeref rejects him as a son. Meanwhile, August begins to cast a powerful spell that threatens to destroy all of Magnolia, along with himself. Elsewhere, Erza and Wendy come face to face with the almighty Acnologia.

episodes.title: Neo Eclipse
episodes.plot: Erza's team meets a mysterious woman with a plan that can completely destroy Acnologia. Meanwhile, Lucy and friends struggle to come to terms with the truth that connects Natsu's life and the Book of E.N.D. that they now hold.

episodes.title: Blind to Love
episodes.plot: Anna, Blue Pegasus, and Erza's team attempt to destroy Acnologia using a hidden rift in time. Elsewhere, Zeref finally obtains everything he needs to reset time and relive his life 400 years earlier, before he turned immortal.

episodes.title: The Door of Vows
episodes.plot: Zeref obtains the power of a god - a power that transcends even time. Natsu seethes with a fiery rage as he holds the unconscious Mavis in his arms. Meanwhile, Acnologia continues to attack Blue Pegasus' ship as Anna struggles to re-open the time rift.

episodes.title: Raging Fire of the Dragon
episodes.plot: Fairy Tail and Blue Pegasus continue to battle Acnologia. With the time rift now open, they're forced to make a difficult decision. In the guildhall, Natsu makes a miraculous recovery and confronts Zeref one final time.

episodes.title: When the Fire Dies
episodes.plot: Mavis faces Zeref alone inside Fairy Tail's guildhall. As she reveals her conflicting feelings and the key to her plan, Zeref makes a sudden realization. Meanwhile, Lucy's team watches as Zeref's Book of E.N.D. starts to fade away.

episodes.title: World Destruction
episodes.plot: Zeref is gone, and Acnologia is now trapped inside a rift in time. Just when it seems like it's time to celebrate, an ominous crack appears in the sky. What's more, all of the Dragon Slayers suddenly vanish into thin air. The battle isn't over just yet.

episodes.title: Magic of Hope
episodes.plot: Inside the time rift, and with the fate of the world on the line, the seven Dragon Slayers battle Acnologia. Outside the rift, Acnologia's physical form continues to wreak havoc. The situation seems hopeless, until Lucy comes up wituh a last-ditch plan. It was an amazing episode and beautiful animation and its the best episode of the series and if you hate fairy tail you can go suck your mum

episodes.title: Hearts Connected
episodes.plot: Lucy's plan for stopping Acnologia's physical form is immediately ruined, but everyone comes together to keep hope alive. Inside the time rift, Natsu and the other Dragon Slayers face the spirit form of Acnologia in an epic seven-against-one battle.

episodes.title: Dearest Friends
episodes.plot: In the last episode of Fairy Tail, Natsu will turn the everyone's feeling into fire to unleash a powerful soulful final blow.

episodes.title: Fairy in the Heart
episodes.plot: After aimlessly wondering around for a week, Natsu and Happy go to Tenrou Island on a pilgrimage. Flashback to 100 years ago, an orphaned Mavis works at a guild who are then attacked by a rival guild.

episodes.title: The Beginning of the Adventure
episodes.plot: Mavis encounters treasure hunter Yuri Dreyar on Tenroujima and accepts his mind game challenge over the Tenrou Jade. This eventually leads to the beginning of a journey, but will Mavis's oldest and only friend Zera agree to go?

episodes.title: Treasure Hunt
episodes.plot: With no wind, the ship isn't going any where. Mavis takes advantage of the situation and explores and underwater shrine, but she runs into trouble.

episodes.title: Dances with Blades
episodes.plot: The crew finally arrives in Hargeon. Mavis and Precht go searching for information when they come across a shady bar.

episodes.title: A Moonlit Lake
episodes.plot: Yuri and Warrod argue, and Precht tells the story of when they tried to find the rainbow flower. A nasty surprise is waiting for them in Magnolia.

episodes.title: Blue Skull
episodes.plot: The group finds that Magnolia has been taken over by Blue Skull. When they fight, the Master sees through Mavis's illusions, rendering her magic useless against them.

episodes.title: The One Who Teaches Magic
episodes.plot: After their defeat by Blue Skull, Mavis encounters Zeref in the forest and convinces him to teach her and the group to use magic.

episodes.title: Treasure
episodes.plot: Mavis convinces the people of the town to join them and stand against Blue Skull. Yuri finds the Tenrou Orb but is cursed upon touching it.

episodes.title: Law
episodes.plot: Mavis defeats the dragon using a spell Zeref taught her, but using it before mastering it comes at a price. A shocking revelation about Zera is revealed.

episodes.title: An Eternal Adventure
episodes.plot: Mavis says goodbye to Zera and decides what her next big adventure is going to be.

episodes.title: Challenger
episodes.plot: It has been a year since the guild dissolved, and now Lucy is an apprentice reporter for Sorcerer Weekly. She is covering the Grand Magic Games in Crocus, where an unexpected challenger infiltrates the arena.

episodes.title: Message of Flame
episodes.plot: After finding that Guild is Disbanded, Natsu pulls a stunt to let everyone know Fairy Tail is back. Natsu, Lucy and Happy set out on a new adventure to return the scattered members.

episodes.title: OVA 8: Fairies' Penalty Game
episodes.plot: Due to the bet they made during the Grand Magic Games, the time has finally come for Team Fairy Tail A and B to decide who will have the privilege to make the other team do whatever they desire, leading to a day's worth of antics from the two parties.

episodes.title: OVA 9: Natsu vs. Mavis
episodes.plot: After Erza recruits Natsu to assist Mavis by allowing her to enjoy the qualities of a hot bath, Team Natsu and Juvia take up Warrod's request to look for a hidden treasure buried by the First Master herself 100 years ago, although the task becomes much harder than it was initially let on.

episodes.title: OVA 10: Fairies' Christmas
episodes.plot: Lucy's apartment becomes the venue for a Christmas party for some of her friends. But the celebration soon devolves into chaos as Erza forces the rest of the guild into playing the Guild Master's Game with her. Erza proves merciless as she orders her friends to perform embarrassing acts. Gray finally manages to avenge everybody and orders Erza to walk home naked at the end of the game. As she leaves the party, she runs into Jellal, who kindly covers her up and accompanies her home.

episodes.title: The Morning of a New Adventure
episodes.plot: Natsu and Gray go on a mission together. When they take longer than expected, Erza, Lucy and Wendy check up on them. When they return, Natsu and Gray receive a job request from a Saint Wizard.

episodes.title: Wizards vs. Hunters
episodes.plot: Natsu's team arrive at Sun Village, a village that has entirely frozen over - including its people. They run into a treasure hunter guild called Sylph Labyrinth who are trying to steal the Eternal Flame.

episodes.title: Law of Retrogression
episodes.plot: Erza turns into a child while trying to find the Eternal Flame and runs into Minerva, who has joined a dark guild. Natsu is also turned into a child by Doriate. Lucy and Wendy fight the treasure hunters and are saved by Flare.

episodes.title: The Devil Returns
episodes.plot: Lucy, Wendy and Flare fight the treasure hunters. Erza fights Minerva but her powers have been extremely reduced. While Natsu is trying to locate the source of the voice he heard, Gray is turned into a child and fights Doriate.

episodes.title: Gray vs. Doriate
episodes.plot: Although Gray's magic power has decreased, his tactical skills have not, and he outwits Doriate. Doriate loses control and transforms into a demon, turning the remaining people on the island into children.

episodes.title: Voice of the Flame
episodes.plot: Natsu fights a monster while Gray tries to thaw the Eternal Flame, but when the ice melts, only a small flame remains. Natsu ignites the flame with his fire power, and discovers who the voice he heard belongs to.

episodes.title: Song of the Fairies
episodes.plot: After the village is saved, it is revealed the Silver Demon Slayer mistook the Eternal Flame for a demon and froze it along with the village. The group spends an evening at a hidden hot-springs with the Wizard Saint Warrod.

episodes.title: Tartarus Arc Prologue: The Nine Demon Gates
episodes.plot: Peace has returned to the Fairy Tail guild, but trouble is brewing for the Magic Council. At long last, the powerful Tartaros dark guild springs into action with full force!

episodes.title: Tartarus Arc Prologue: Fairies vs. Netherworld
episodes.plot: Laxus fights a mysterious and powerful Tartaros enemy who's out to kill an old Council member. And, after everything that's happened, Fairy Tail declares war on Tartaros!

episodes.title: Tartarus Arc Prologue: The White Legacy
episodes.plot: Jackal is bent on taking the life of former Council member Michello, but Fairy Tail stands in the way. Natsu and friends try to stop Jackal, but quickly learn that they're facing no ordinary foe!

episodes.title: Tartarus Arc Prologue: Natsu vs. Jackal
episodes.plot: Multiple Fairy Tail teams rush to protect former Council members from the deadly Tartaros guild. But things look bleak even for Natsu's team...

episodes.title: Immorality and Sinners
episodes.plot: Erza and Mirajane rush to protect Crawford, the former Magic Council chairman. Meanwhile, Doranbolt frees the Oración Seis, and Natsu has a shocking realization about Tartaros...

episodes.title: Jellal vs. Oración Seis
episodes.plot: Natsu and Happy find where the Tartaros guild has been hiding! Happy rushes to alert the rest of Fairy Tail, but little does anyone know that an unexpected trap has been set. Elsewhere, Jellal singlehandedly fights the members of Oración Seis.

episodes.title: A Place Reached by Prayer
episodes.plot: Jellal's life is the final key to unsealing the devastating Face weapon. But Tartaros is bent on finding him, and the Oración Seis already have him in dire straits...

episodes.title: The Demon's Rebirth
episodes.plot: Elfman's attempt to blow up Fairy Tail reaches its explosive conclusion! Elsewhere, Lummy begins to transform Mirajane into a hideous creation meant to do Tartaros' bidding. This looks like the end for the Fairy Tail guild!

episodes.title: To Let Live or Die
episodes.plot: The legendary Zeref has a special one-on-one meeting with Natsu. Other members of Fairy Tail discover that the terrifying Face weapon has been activated. They quickly set out to stop it, but they meet with heavy resistance!

episodes.title: Wendy vs. Ezel
episodes.plot: Natsu must fight a demon that can absorb other beings' souls and take their form... including one of a surprising character! Elsewhere, Wendy and Carla rush to stop the Face from detonating, but they're greeted by a formidable foe.

episodes.title: Friends Forever
episodes.plot: Wendy has unleashed a new power from within herself, but can she master it in time to stop the doomsday Face weapon?! And what of Natsu and friends, as they face a grotesque version of the almighty Master Hades?!

episodes.title: Hell's Core
episodes.plot: After the secret of Tartaros' strength is revealed, Mirajane and Seilah face off in an intense battle. The only problem: they're immune to each other's powers! Meanwhile, Erza reunites with an old foe with new strength...

episodes.title: Underworld King
episodes.plot: Rustyrose of Grimoire Heart suddenly appears before Jellal, Meldy, and the Oración Seis. He shares his encounter with Tartaros' formidable Kyoka... but things aren't quite what they seem.

episodes.title: Alegria
episodes.plot: Mirajane struggles against the demon Seilah, whose full potential has been unleashed. Elsewhere, the Underworld King takes control of the chaotic situation by showing everyone who's boss!

episodes.title: Attack of the Celestials
episodes.plot: Everyone in Fairy Tail has fallen victim to Mard Geer's Alegria technique... except for Lucy. Unfortunately, that means she must face off with the mighty Tartaros guild all alone!

episodes.title: The Celestial King vs. The Underworld King
episodes.plot: Out of strength and on the verge of defeat, Lucy makes a great sacrifice to summon the Celestial Spirit King. Tartaros' base is quickly decimated, and soon the Celestial Spirit King and the Underworld King reunite...

episodes.title: Erza vs. Minerva
episodes.plot: Wendy and Carla learn the full truth of Tartaros' Face plan, and it's not good. Elsewhere, Erza faces off with Minerva, who has undergone a demonic transformation. At last, their final showdown is at hand!

episodes.title: A Young Boy's Story
episodes.plot: Sabertooth members arrive to lend backup in the war against Tartaros! While Erza rushes to find the guild's control room, Gray learns the shocking truth about Silver...

episodes.title: Gray vs. Silver
episodes.plot: Juvia continues to battle with the enigmatic Keyes. Elsewhere, Gray faces off with Silver in a showdown that's been ten long years in the making!

episodes.title: Silver Memories
episodes.plot: Silver reveals his true past to Gray once and for all and Juvia is tasked with defeating Keyes to stop the Faces and save the day.

episodes.title: Air
episodes.plot: While Natsu and Gajeel are fighting their opponents, a mysterious black water begins to flood the grounds and saps their strength. One by one they start to pass out, with Gajeel's iron skin the only thing keeping him conscious.

episodes.title: Steel
episodes.plot: Levy gives Gajeel air and he finally unleashes the strength to defeat Torafuzar. Laxus returns for a rematch against Tempester, but he is hiding something.

episodes.title: The Final Duels
episodes.plot: Laxus' battle intensifies and he has one last trick up his sleeve to put Tempester down for good, but will Erza's group make it to the control room in time to stop face from activating?

episodes.title: Wings of Despair
episodes.plot: Kyoka absorbs Selia's power, and she and Erza begin their battle. The guild is shocked by the arrival of past foe looking to destroy E.N.D., and Natsu hears Igneel call out to him.

episodes.title: The Fire Dragon's Iron Fist
episodes.plot: Igneel fights Achnologia and tasks Natsu with stealing the Book of E.N.D. from the King of the underworld. Kyoka forms a living link with the Face activation device in order to speed up the process.
Kyoka breaks through all of Erza's armors and takes away her 5 senses. Will Erza still be able to beat her before Face activates?

episodes.title: The Girl in the Crystal
episodes.plot: Natsu, Sting, and Rogue struggle against the Underworld King. Master Macarov reveals the ace that has been kept a secret among the masters of Fairy Tail.

episodes.title: The Definitive Demon
episodes.plot: Mard Geer reveals why Zeref created the demons. Gray shows off his new powers but is struck down by Jiemma, who has been transformed into a demon.

episodes.title: Memento Mori
episodes.plot: Sting and Rogue take down Jiemma. The battle between Mard Geer and Natsu and Gray rages on, until Mard unleashes a curse called memento Mori.

episodes.title: Soaring in Ishgar
episodes.plot: The other guilds begin attacking the faces but to no avail. Gray and Natsu take down Mard Geer, but face has already activated. Will the appearance of surprise allies turn the tide of the battle?

episodes.title: Drops of Fire
episodes.plot: In this epilogue to the Tartaros saga, the dragons reveal a tragic secret to Fairy Tail, while Natsu makes a vow to Igneel's fading soul. In the aftermath, Makarov dissolves the guild, several members set out on their own quests, and Zeref drops a shocking revelation.

episodes.title: Where the Power of Life Lies
episodes.plot: Dorenbalt wipes the memories of the guild members, and another revelation is made about Dorenbalt. Macarov decides to disband the guild while members go on journeys to become stronger.

episodes.title: King of the Dragons
episodes.plot: Following Sting and Rogue's defeat, Ziemma furiously attempts to expel the two from Saber Tooth. When Lector defends Sting, Ziemma seemingly kills him, prompting Sting to blast the guild master through the chest.

episodes.title: The Eclipse Project
episodes.plot: Arcadios reveals the details of the top-secret Eclipse Project to Natsu and friends, but things quickly go awry when Lucy is taken into custody.

episodes.title: Fairy Tactician
episodes.plot: Mavis reveals her incredible skill as a strategist as the final event of the Grand Magic Games begins. Meanwhile, Natsu's squad tries to rescue Lucy.

episodes.title: Gray vs. Rufus
episodes.plot: Gray squares off against Rufus in a Make magic rematch. Meanwhile, Natsu and friends devise a unique way to escape from their imprisonment.

episodes.title: The Hungry Wolf Knights
episodes.plot: Sabertooth has a new master. And Fairy Tail may be on top of the Grand Magic Games, but below the palace, Natsu and the others are still trapped in Palace Hell. And then things get worse when the hunters become the hunted - by the Garou Knights.

episodes.title: Fairy Tail vs. Executioners
episodes.plot: Though their appearances may be foolish, the Garou Knights are the strongest executioners in the kingdom. And now, the members of Fairy Tail's "away team" are separated from each other and forced into one-on-one combat against the knights.

episodes.title: Scorching Earth
episodes.plot: Lucy and Yukino team up and use their celestial spirits to battle the powerful Uosuke.

episodes.title: Our Place
episodes.plot: Natsu and friends teach the Hungry Wolf Knights who's boss, once and for all.

episodes.title: The Kingdom 'til Tomorrow
episodes.plot: Erza, Kagura, and Minerva face each other in an unpredictable, three-way battle. Meanwhile, Natsu and friends make an unexpected encounter.

episodes.title: Erza vs. Kagura
episodes.plot: Future Lucy collapses and is taken in by Natsu's team, while Princess Hisui and Jellal ponder over the upcoming calamity. Meanwhile, as Gajeel and Laxus square off against Rogue and Olga, respectively, Minerva pits Erza and Kagura against each other before leaving with Millianna.

episodes.title: A Future Racing Toward Despair
episodes.plot: The battle between Erza and Kagura comes to a surprising end. Meanwhile, Future Lucy reveals the horrific incident that will soon unfold.

episodes.title: Frog
episodes.plot: Gajeel and Rogue face off in an unusual, surprising battle. Future Lucy puts her knowledge of events to good use, but something still seems strange.

episodes.title: Roaring Thunder!
episodes.plot: Using his new shadow powers, Gajeel overpowers and finally defeats the possessed Rogue. The shadow exits Rogue's body, erasing his memory of the fight.

episodes.title: Gloria
episodes.plot: The final battle of the Grand Magic Games is about to come to an end, but Fairy Tail faces one last foe.

episodes.title: The One Who Closes the Gate
episodes.plot: Jellal makes an unexpected realization about Future Lucy. Meanwhile, Natsu and friends come face-to-face with the same revelation.

episodes.title: Natsu vs. Rogue
episodes.plot: All the guild wizards in Crocus unite to defend Fiore from the looming dragon threat. Elsewhere, Natsu battles the future version of Rogue.

episodes.title: For Me, Too
episodes.plot: The guild wizards must face the ferocious dragons in battle while Lucy struggles to shut the Eclipse gate.

episodes.title: Seven Dragons
episodes.plot: Fairy Tail and the other guilds face an impossible task: defeat the seven dragons that came through the Eclipse gate.

episodes.title: Zirconis' Magic
episodes.plot: As the dragons' assault intensifies, Zirconis unleashes a surprising new spell. Meanwhile, Natsu continues to struggle against Future Rogue.

episodes.title: Human and Human, Dragon and Dragon, Human and Dragon
episodes.plot: Natsu jumps onto the back of the fire dragon Atlas Flame and begins eating the flames covering his body. Back in Crocus, Rogue Learn that his future self is responsible for the attack on Crocus. Ultear plots to kill Rogue.

episodes.title: Sin and Sacrifice
episodes.plot: Millianna finally confronts Jellal in the middle of the war-torn city. Elsewhere, the battle against the smaller dragons takes a drastic turn.

episodes.title: Time of Life
episodes.plot: Ultear uses her ultimate time-manipulation spell to try to undo recent events - but at great cost.

episodes.title: Golden Grasslands
episodes.plot: The Fairy Tail wizards focus all their power on the Eclipse gate in a last-ditch effort to destroy it and change the future.

episodes.title: The Grand Ball
episodes.plot: The King throws a ball to celebrate the end of the battle.

episodes.title: Drop of Time
episodes.plot: The fairy tail members start heading home. Dorenbolt wipes the memory of the council to hide the battle with dragons. Jellal and Meldy are looking for Ultear when a mysterious elderly lady gives them a letter from her.

episodes.title: A Gift
episodes.plot: Upon returning home, Fairy Tail receives a gift from the Mayor. Natsu, Lucy and Happy accept a job to get rid of a monster.

episodes.title: Welcome Home, Frosch
episodes.plot: Frosch goes missing when shopping with Lector and is determined to make it back to Sabertooth by himself, bumping into various members of other guilds along the way. The members of Sabertooth cheer him on from the sidelines.

episodes.title: Moulin Rouge
episodes.plot: When Erza sees a white cue ball used in playing billiards, she tells her story of her first experience in billiards and her first encounter with Moulin Rogue.

episodes.title: Full Effort Hospitality!
episodes.plot: As thanks for helping them close the Eclipse Gate, Lucy and Yukino invite each of their celestial spirits to Star Hill to grant each of them a wish.

episodes.title: Beacon of Rebellion
episodes.plot: Lucy and Yukino are unable to summon their Zodiac celestial spirits. A change in the celestial spirit world causes the Zodiac spirits to lose their memories and their personalities change.

episodes.title: Panic of Library
episodes.plot: Fairy Tail split into teams to do research on the Liberam. As usual Natsu does not follow the plan and sneaks into the spirit world alone. Virgo attacks the library where Lucy, Levy and Yukino are.

episodes.title: Hisui Rises
episodes.plot: The Princess and Arcadios reveal the reason behind the changes in the spirit world and give them a way to force-close zodiac gates. Natsu, Lucy, Levy and Yukino fight against Pisces.

episodes.title: Astral Spirytus
episodes.plot: Natsu's team interrupts the zodiac's Liberam ritual and a fight ensues. The rest of Fairy Tail arrives to back them up. They follow the zodiac spirits into the rift between the human and celestial worlds. Elfman battles Taurus.

episodes.title: Wendy vs. Aquarius - Let's Play at an Amusement Park
episodes.plot: Cana battles Cancer in a card game while Wendy and Aquarius play at the amusement park. Natsu joins Wendy after Loke knocks him into the amusement park.

episodes.title: Guild Deck vs. Celestial Spirit Deck
episodes.plot: While Cana continues to battle Cancer in a card game, Levy faces Capricorn in a trivia quiz and Mirajane fights Pisces in an underwater battle.

episodes.title: Gray vs. Cancer - Dance Battle!
episodes.plot: Gray and Cancer dance off in a battle.

episodes.title: Juvia vs. Aries - Clash in the Desert!
episodes.plot: Levy must make a confession to win the trivia quiz against Capricorn, and Natsu and Wendy run into the snake charmer celestial spirit, Ophiuchus. Meanwhile, Juvia struggles to fight Aries in the desert.

episodes.title: Erza vs. Sagittarius - Horseback Showdown!
episodes.plot: Gajeel and Panther Lily are transformed into small animals by Gemini during their battle with the twin spirits, but Gajeel eventually discovers he can still use his magic and easily knocks them out. Meanwhile, Sagittarius challenges Erza to three horseriding contests.

episodes.title: Natsu vs. Leo
episodes.plot: Loke re-starts the Liberam ritual. Natsu fights him while Wendy, Happy and Carla try to steal the celestial globe.

episodes.title: The Ophiuchus Constellation
episodes.plot: Natsu and Arcadios fight Ophiuchus. Natsu combines the twelve celestial realms so Lucy and Yukino must stop Virgo and Libra together. It is revealed the closure of the spirits' gates was all apart of the Celestial Spirit King's plan.

episodes.title: When the Stars Are Filled All Over
episodes.plot: Natsu's group continues to fight against Ophiuchus, but her weapon proves difficult to beat. The rest of Fairy Tail figure out a way to stop the Astral Spiritus.

episodes.title: The Sacred Starbeast
episodes.plot: Although Ophiuchus was defeated, the ritual wasn't stopped in time. Fairy Tail enters the celestial spirit world to prevent its destruction. They're faced with the Eclipse Celestial Spirit King, who begins to turn them into constellations.

episodes.title: Believe
episodes.plot: Natsu enters the Celestial Beast to free the Celestial King and spirits. After the Clestial Spirit World is saved, the spirits lose their memories of the events and return to normal.

episodes.title: What a True Heart Weaves
episodes.plot: Natsu looks after Asca for a day while Bisca and Alzack are on a job.

episodes.title: 413 Days
episodes.plot: It is the 413th day since Juvia met Gray. She asks the guild members what would make the perfect anniversary gift for him.

episodes.title: The White Silver Labyrinth
episodes.plot: Natsu, Lucy and Happy travel up Mt. Hakobe to get special Hakobe ice. They become lost in a living cave and run out of food.

episodes.title: Transform!
episodes.plot: Natsu and Lucy try to learn transformation magic. Macao and Wakaba also try to learn but become monsters. Erza, Gajeel and Lily become superheroes and must defeat them.

episodes.title: Kemokemo Arrived!
episodes.plot: When an egg falls from the sky, Natsu decides to raise it. Fairy Tail participants in a student exchange program between guilds, so Natsu, Lucy, Gray and Erza decide to go to find out more about the mystery animal.

episodes.title: The Place You Came Before
episodes.plot: After an island emerges from the sea, a Fairy-Sabertooth coalition is formed to find the source of the mysterious life signs that the Magic Council detected. Kemo-Kemo remembers his purpose.

episodes.title: The Thunder Man
episodes.plot: A town plagued by lightening asks for Laxus' help. It is thought Laxus may be the cause of their problem.

episodes.title: Fairy Tail of the Dead Meeeeeeeeen
episodes.plot: A potion created by Sir Ichiya pollutes Magnolia and turns its residents into Ichiya zombies.

episodes.title: OVA 1: Welcome to Fairy Hills!!
episodes.plot: Lucy notices a mysterious hand-written request in which the client is looking for an object located in Fairy Tail's female dormitory, Fairy Hills. To ensure that the job is not a prank, she goes to verify it. Once she reaches the dormitory, she learns that the client is Hilda, the dorm's head, who asks her to find a "shining treasure" while wearing an embarrassing cat outfit.

episodes.title: OVA 2: Fairy Academy - Yankee and Yankee
episodes.plot: Lucy Heartfilia is a transfer student at Fairy Academy. So are Natsu, Wendy, Erza, Gray, and the gang. But with such unpredictable classmates in Fairy Academy, trouble is not far ahead. A rival school is causing trouble for the gang, Gajeel and Juvia at the head, and Natsu and Gray set out to stop them. Meanwhile, Erza, the class president, is experiencing romance issues about a handsome stranger.

episodes.title: Fairy Tail the Movie: Phoenix Priestess
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: OVA 4: Fairies' Training Camp
episodes.plot: Mavis is bored staying alone in Tenrou Island, so she decides to pay the guild a visit, unaware that the Fairy Tail members are going to the beach for a training camp which she decides to tag along as well. The group faces a lot of trouble that are caused by Natsu and Gray. What would happen if the girls got drunk?

episodes.title: OVA 5: The First Morning
episodes.plot: This OVA is showing a day of Eclair's life as a prologue to the movie Houou no Miko.

episodes.title: OVA 6: Fairy Tail x Rave Master
episodes.plot: While looking for Natsu, Lucy bumped with Elie who is looking for Haru. A misunderstanding caused Haru and Natsu to fight each other, not knowing that they are supposed to be teaming up to fight the real enemy.

episodes.title: Sabertooth
episodes.plot: Former enemies make amends and Fairy Tail continues to try to repair its reputation as the Fiore Kingdom reels from recent crises. Meanwhile, the Legion Platoon is given a new mission, and Makarov shows Gildarts the guild's greatest secret.

episodes.title: And We Aim for the Top
episodes.plot: Natsu unleashes an electrifying new move! Inspired, the guild goes in search of a way to increase their magic power without actually putting in the work of training. Meanwhile, leadership of the guild changes hands...more than once.

episodes.title: Song of the Stars
episodes.plot: As Natsu and the gang prepare for the Grand Magic Games, Lucy gets an alarming call from Virgo. She leads them to the Celestial Spirit World, where they come across a great surprise.

episodes.title: Only Enough Time to Pass by One Another
episodes.plot: As guilds across the Fiore Kingdom prepare for the games, three powerful enemies from Fairy Tail's past show up and ask the guild for a favor. In return, they offer Natsu and his teammates a painful power-up that will take their magic to the next level.

episodes.title: The Blooming Capital: Crocus
episodes.plot: Fairy Tail's five representatives for the Grand Magic Games are chosen! But trouble follows the guild to the capital of the Fiore Kingdom, and if all the reps aren't back to their assigned inn by midnight, they may be out before the games even begin.

episodes.title: Sky Labyrinth
episodes.plot: The first elimination challenge has begun, and representatives from Fairy Tail have to navigate a giant labyrinth in the sky quickly if they want to be one of the guilds that move on to the next round. The only problem? One of their members is missing.

episodes.title: New Guild
episodes.plot: Having barely qualified to continue in the Grand Magic Games, one of Fairy Tail's representatives has to be replaced. As the competing guilds are introduced, Natsu and the others size up their competition--which includes an unexpected set of foes.

episodes.title: In a Night of Falling Stars
episodes.plot: The Grand Magic Games have begun! Gray represents one of Fairy Tail's teams on the first day of the competition in a magical hide-and-seek challenge carried out in a playing field full of multiple copies of the contestants.

episodes.title: Lucy vs. Flare
episodes.plot: Raven Tail has been picking on Fairy Tail from the beginning, but now that Lucy is up against one of their wizards--Flare--the guilds are truly going head-to-head! Whichever wizard gets knocked out first loses, but just what is the dark guild after?

episodes.title: Bad Omen
episodes.plot: The battles continue as wizards from the competing guilds go spell-for-spell in the stadium center. When Jellal-as-Mystogan takes on a member of Lamia Scale, will he be able to make up for all of Fairy Tail's previous losses?

episodes.title: Chariots
episodes.plot: After being completely annihilated on the first day of the Grand Magic Games, Fairy Tail tries to recover and keep high spirits for the remaining rounds. Elsewhere, the captain of the guard is up to something suspicious, and Carla has a terrible vision.

episodes.title: Elfman vs. Bacchus
episodes.plot: Elfman takes center stage as he fights a talented martial artist--and unveils a powerful new beast form! Meanwhile, Raven Tail continues to bully the other guilds, and two of Fairy Tail's members are kidnapped from the infirmary.

episodes.title: Mirajane vs. Jenny
episodes.plot: A battle between Mirajane and a pinup model from Blue Pegasus turns into a knock-down-drag-out fight of sexy poses and costume changes. As the arena fills with bikini-clad wizards, a dark plot against one of Fairy Tail's members unfolds behind the scenes.

episodes.title: Kagura vs. Yukino
episodes.plot: As the second day of the Grand Magic Games draws to a close, an epic fight between Sabertooth's powerful celestial wizard and Mermaid Heel's leaping swordswoman rocks the stadium. Later, Erza comes across a spritely figure from her past.

episodes.title: Malice Is Concealed by the Veil of Darkness
episodes.plot: After Yukino is expelled from Saber Tooth, she offers her two golden Gatekeys to Lucy to complete the latter's collection of the Zodiac Gatekeys, stating that when the twelve Zodiac Gatekeys are all gathered, a gateway that changes the world will open.

episodes.title: Pandemonium
episodes.plot: After Natsu punches out Dobengal, the guild member summoned to fight him, he and Jiemma engage in a duel. However, the guild master's daughter Minerva appears.

episodes.title: 100 Versus 1
episodes.plot: Erza kills the 100 monsters using various types of armor to match their strength and weaknesses.

episodes.title: Laxus vs. Alexei
episodes.plot: As the battles continue to rage in the Grand Magic Games, an ancient magic is performed in the stadium. Later, Laxus takes on Raven Tail-his father's guild-but there's much more to this epic match than meets the eye.

episodes.title: Wendy vs. Chelia
episodes.plot: After Laxus defeats Ivan and the four Raven Tail elite members, Ivan's illusions disappear to the shock of everyone in the stadium. Later, Wendy of Fairy Tail Team A and Sherria Blendy of Team Lamia Scale face off to compete for the final match of the day.

episodes.title: A Small Fist
episodes.plot: With Cheria being fully healed and Wendy being almost depleted of magic power, their battle continues, with the former casting a high-level spell towards the latter. However, it seems that Wendy enhances Cheria's physical strength, causing the attack to gain much force and thus missing Wendy.

episodes.title: Naval Battle
episodes.plot: As the jubilant Fairy Tail members celebrate their victories, the other people, such as Sting, Kagura, and Milliana, are contemplating on their own concerns, while Yukino is enlisted as a sergeant under Arcadios' command. Meanwhile, the fourth day of the competitions comes to a start with an event, "Naval Battle", which involves the participants swimming in a giant water sphere and knocking the other competitors out.

episodes.title: The Perfume Dedicated to You
episodes.plot: While Lucy is hospitalized and taken to the infirmary, the Fairy Tail members warn Saber Tooth that they have angered the worst possible guild to do so. Later, Makarov announces that the two Fairy Tail teams must merge as a result of the disqualification of Raven Tail.

episodes.title: Battle of Dragon Slayers
episodes.plot: Mermaid Heel's Kagura and Milliana and Lamia Scale's Lyon and Yuka face off for the second tag battle of the games. For the third and final match of the day, the spectators look on in silence as Natsu and Gajeel of Team Fairy Tail and Sting and Rogue of Team Saber Tooth enter the field.

episodes.title: Four Dragons
episodes.plot: The tag battle continues, with Sting and Rogue beginning to attack Natsu and Gajeel with their powers being increased.

episodes.title: Natsu vs. The Twin Dragons
episodes.plot: The tag battle of the Dragon Slayers comes to a close, with Natsu overpowering the combined attacks of Sting and Rogue. The Saber Tooth members watch in dismay, while Jiemma seethes in anger.

episodes.title: Best Partners
episodes.plot: Natsu, Gray, Juvia, Elfman, Cana, Fried, Levy, and Mystogan's disciple Mest are selected to participate in Fairy Tail's annual S-Class promotion exam, and are instructed to choose a partner to accompany them during the exam.

episodes.title: Who's the Lucky One?
episodes.plot: Eight wizard duos travel to an island rich with magic--but only one wizard will be given S-Class ranking. The first battle of the trials begins as Lucy and Cana go head-to-head with two members of the Thunder God Tribe.

episodes.title: Natsu vs. Gildarts
episodes.plot: Juvia and Lisanna are pitted against Erza, while Elfman and Evergreen are pitted against Mirajane. Meanwhile, Natsu enthusiastically fights Gildarts, with a series of flashbacks detailing how Natsu had never once been able to defeat him since childhood.

episodes.title: Mest
episodes.plot: Guild members begin to wonder about Mest, who has a peculiar place in their memories. Meanwhile, only five duos are left in the exam as the second trial begins and the wizards are tasked with finding the grave of Fairy Tail's founding guild master.

episodes.title: Black Wizard
episodes.plot: Natsu attacks the black-haired youth to no effect, causing the youth to despair that Natsu is not strong enough to defeat him. The youth unleashes another wave of deadly magic against Natsu and disappears, but Natsu is protected from the attack by his scarf, which turns black.

episodes.title: Iron Soul
episodes.plot: Gajeel and Levy fight Kawazu and Yomazu, who reveal that they are scouting the island to kill the Fairy Tail wizards. Though seriously wounded, Gajeel sends Levy to warn their guildmates of Grimoire Heart's attack.

episodes.title: Makarov Strikes
episodes.plot: While being interrogated, Mest rescues Wendy from an attack by Azuma, one of the Seven Kin. Mest reveals himself to be a Magic Council agent named Doranbalt, sent to search for incriminating evidence against Fairy Tail and disband it.

episodes.title: Lost Magic
episodes.plot: Makarov is defeated and gravely wounded in his battle against Hades, which is sensed by the wandering Laxus. Meanwhile, the other members of Fairy Tail battle Grimoire Heart's army.

episodes.title: Fire Dragon vs. Flame God
episodes.plot: Natsu is overwhelmed by Zancrow's God Slayer magic, which proves superior to his own Dragon Slayer magic.

episodes.title: The Ultimate Magic World
episodes.plot: Azuma learns of Mirajane's former identity as the "Demon" and straps Lisanna to a time bomb so he can fight Mirajane at full strength.

episodes.title: Arc of Embodiment
episodes.plot: Elfman and Evergreen are overwhelmed and defeated by Rustyrose's Arc of Incarnation, which gives him the power to create anything from his imagination. Meanwhile, Loke realizes Caprico is the celestial spirit Capricorn, and that he has the power to take control of humans.

episodes.title: The Door of Humans
episodes.plot: Caprico reveals himself to be a human named Zoldio who fused with Capricorn using his Human Subordination magic. He possesses Loke, but Loke gives his Regulus ring to the newly freed Capricorn.

episodes.title: Lucy Fire
episodes.plot: Lucy and Hikaru's battle interrupts Natsu's battle with Ultear, leading Natsu to help Lucy and reform their old team while Ultear leaves with Zeref.

episodes.title: Dead-End of Despair
episodes.plot: Doranbalt tries to help Natsu and his friends evacuate the island as the Magic Council plans to fire Etherion once again, but they refuse to leave. Meanwhile, Juvia is nearly defeated during her and Erza's battle against Merudy of the Seven Kin.

episodes.title: The Tears of Love and Life
episodes.plot: When Gray, Juvia, and a Grimoire Heart wizard are linked together by a dark magic, one wrong move could mean the death of all three of them. Meanwhile, Ultear's past is revealed as she confronts Gray--the one she holds responsible for her mother's death.

episodes.title: The One Thing I Couldn't Say
episodes.plot: Cana discovers the grave of Mavis, Fairy Tail's founding master. After thinking about her troubled past--and connection the Gildarts--she receives the powerful spell Fairy Glitter. But even this magic might not be enough to take out Grimoire Heart.

episodes.title: Tenrou Tree
episodes.plot: The guild continues to take on the members of Grimoire Heart as Erza goes head-to-head with Azuma. But when the dark wizard becomes one with the island flora, a secret magic is revealed and the island itself falls into peril.

episodes.title: Erza vs. Azuma
episodes.plot: With all the magic suddenly drained from their bodies, the wizards of Fairy Tail are powerless against their enemies. Their lives depend on one guild mate--Erza--but even she might not have the strength to save them.

episodes.title: Frozen Spirit
episodes.plot: The battle against Grimoire Heart continues as everyone's power suddenly returns! Gray vows to stop the dark guild using Iced Shell--sacrificing himself in the process--at the suggestion of Ultear, his former-teacher's daughter.

episodes.title: The Power That Becomes Life
episodes.plot: After confirming her treachery, Gray take on Ultear, channeling the memory of his former teacher in a dangerous attempt to defeat the time-altering wizard. But as Ultear's history comes to light, it's more complicated than even she realizes.

episodes.title: Thunder Crashes
episodes.plot: The guild splits up into teams in order to strike back against Grimoire Heart, taking the fight straight to Hades. Elsewhere on the island, Zeref's power is unleashed, taking out members from both sides of the battle.

episodes.title: The Man Without the Mark
episodes.plot: A surprise appearance from one of Fairy Tail's expelled members gives the team a fighting chance. Meanwhile, Happy, Carla, and Panther Lily search the dark guild's ship as they try to find the source of its powers.

episodes.title: Realm of the Abyss
episodes.plot: Powered by fire AND lightning, Natsu strikes out against the leader of Grimoire Heart, just as he unleashes a demonic magic assault. When Happy, Carla, and Panther Lily finally find the heart of the dark guild's ship, they're attacked by lackeys.

episodes.title: Daybreak at Tenrou Island
episodes.plot: The island's magic tree is brought back to life by an unexpected source, restoring power to the members of Fairy Tail, who rally for one final group attack--but will the guild's mercy be their undoing? And why is Erza dressed in a nurse's uniform?

episodes.title: The Right to Love
episodes.plot: Fairy Tail may have defeated Grimoire Heart, but it is the Black Wizard Zeref who will ultimately punish the dark guild. Meanwhile, Cana finally spills her family secret to Gildarts.

episodes.title: Let's Join Hands
episodes.plot: As Fairy Tail recovers from their recent battles, a black dragon--Acnologia--appears in the sky. Even with the combined powers of every guild member, the wizards are helpless to stop its destruction of the magic island.

episodes.title: X791 Fairy Tail
episodes.plot: Seven years have passed since most of Fairy Tail's wizards disappeared following a dragon's attack. In that time, the guild has fallen into disrepair and lost its standing. Is there any hope that the wizards will return before the guild falls apart?

episodes.title: The Empty Seven Years
episodes.plot: Everyone learns about what they missed in the last 7 years.

episodes.title: Magic Dance Ball
episodes.plot: Fairy Tail takes an assignment to protect a rich family from being robbed during their semi-annual ball.

episodes.title: The Truly Evil Jiggle Butt Gang
episodes.plot: Natsu's motion sickness gets out of control as the members of Fairy Tail escort a client's giant shipment of gold via train. With the dragon slayer down for the count, can the others protect the freight from the notorious Butt Jiggle Gang?

episodes.title: The Terror of Invisible Lucy
episodes.plot: Lucy uses an expired magical ointment and accidentally turns her invisible. Her newfound powers provide plenty of hijinks, but what happens when she can't figure out how to become visible again--and everything around her starts disappearing?

episodes.title: Father's Memento
episodes.plot: A mysterious girl claiming to be Lucy's distant relative shows up at the guild with a relic she says Lucy's father wanted to make sure was in his daughter's hands. But there may be more to this artifact--and girl--than meets the eye.

episodes.title: Raging Showdown! Natsu vs. Laxus
episodes.plot: Lucy and Michelle work on solving the inscription on her gift. While a festival is held in honor of Natsu and Laxus's rematch. Grey and Erza go on an assignment together.

episodes.title: Targeted Lucy
episodes.plot: Earth Land versions of Edolas villains show up to Fairy Tail to take Lucy.

episodes.title: Legion's Fierceness
episodes.plot: Gildarts enters the fray as Fairy Tail continues to battle the mysterious wizards who have come for Lucy. As spells fly, the truth about who the attackers are starts to come to light--along with what they're really after.

episodes.title: Key of the Starry Heaven
episodes.plot: In order to track down Lucy's stolen key, several members of Fairy Tail visit the old Heartfilia mansion to see if there are any clues about the relic's history there. The search is a success, but is interrupted by unexpected members of the Legion Corps.

episodes.title: Traveling Companions
episodes.plot: By studying the book from the Heartfilia library, Lucy discovers that there are five more clock pieces hidden throughout the world. Fairy Tail splits up to hunt them down before the Legion can, and the groups run into strange characters on the road.

episodes.title: Labyrinth Rhapsody
episodes.plot: Natus and Lucy's expedition team discovers a strange gateway in the middle of the desert that leads to a dangerous underground dungeon. Elsewhere, Gray's team discovers a puzzle-filled cave--and Sugar Boy.

episodes.title: Trail of the Myth
episodes.plot: Natsu team runs into two members of the Legion Corps in the underground dungeon. Lucy gets shrunk, Happy becomes a giant, and the only way for the wizards to prevail might be through really bad smells and...marriage?!

episodes.title: The True Villain, Once Again
episodes.plot: The Butt Jiggle Gang is back and they're dead-set on finding one of the mysterious clock parts before Fairy Tail does. In order to get ahead of them, Erza dons one of their skintight black uniforms and teaches them the meaning of true villainy.

episodes.title: That Which Exceeds Calculation
episodes.plot: As the Fairy Tail expedition teams continue to discover clock components, Legion Corps ramps up its assault against the guild. When Samuel and Pantherlily go head to head, it's an Exceed battle like the wizards have never seen before.

episodes.title: The Whereabouts of the Crusade
episodes.plot: One of Legion's members manages to separate Mirajane's demon form from her body and uses it to attack the wizard's family! Meanwhile, the secret order's crusade finally comes to light along with the terrifying truth behind the infinity clock.

episodes.title: The Moment That's Activated
episodes.plot: Natsu's team of wizards goes head-to-head with Byro, a powerful adversary with the power to nullify magic attacks. Elsewhere, the members of Zentopia grow restless as the Archbishop's condition continues to worsen.

episodes.title: Reborn Oración Seis Appears!
episodes.plot: One of Fairy Tail's most powerful enemies--Oracion Seis--has been reborn, and the members are now deadlier than ever. When they show up demanding the Infinity Clock, will anyone be able to stand in their way?

episodes.title: Chase the Infinite Clock!
episodes.plot: As Fairy Tail recovers from their encounter with the new Oracian Seis, Kinana enters a trance-like state and carves something in an ancient language into the walls of the guild. Meanwhile, the Legion Platoon gets a strange new member.

episodes.title: The Dissonance of Battle
episodes.plot: Lahar tracks down a jaded Doranbolt--who now goes by Mest--at a pub, Laki and Gildarts discover a creepy set of nuns, and Fairy Tail's newest teams face off against members of the new Oracion Seis (along with some members of the Legion Platoon).

episodes.title: Anti-Link
episodes.plot: As Fairy Tail and Legion Platoon wizards face off with members of the reborn Oracion Seis, Mest and Lahar discover a Celestial Wizard named Katja who has important information about Zentopia--and a connection to Will Neville.

episodes.title: Unleashed Despair
episodes.plot: Now that it's been confirmed the new Oración Seis is actually targeting select Celestial Wizards and not churches, the truth about Michelle is revealed. As the Infinity Clock begins to work, it's catastrophic magic blackens the sky.

episodes.title: Real Nightmare
episodes.plot: Archaeologists show up at the guild's headquarters with background on Jude Heartfilia and the Infinity Clock--as well as a powerful evil-vanquishing hammer. Meanwhile, Natsu tries to escape a magical prison with the help of...the Butt Jiggle Gang?!

episodes.title: The Spiral of Time
episodes.plot: As the Infinity Clock's powers begin to activate, the world descends into chaos. Fairy Tail's special team heads to the Infinity Clock, where Lucy is being prepared as a sacrifice. Meanwhile, the deep corruption within Zentopia is finally exposed.

episodes.title: To the Infinity Castle!
episodes.plot: The Legion Platoon turns their sights on Lucy, vowing to destroy her in order to save the rest of the world from the Infinity Clock. As Wendy tries to heal the Archbishop, Happy comes up with a plan that could save Lucy, but time is running out.

episodes.title: The Angel's Tears
episodes.plot: The Infinity Clock's magic continues to wreak havoc on the world as a handful of Fairy Tail wizards make a last-chance effort to save Lucy and stop the Real Nightmare. Four members of Oración Seis must be defeated, but can Gray defeat a host of angels?

episodes.title: A Friend's Voice Is Heard
episodes.plot: Three dark wizards must be defeated to save the world, but Lucy's body has almost completely merged with the Infinity Clock. When the Archbishop wakes, he's able to explain how the clock operates, and how Fairy Tail might stall the Real Nightmare.

episodes.title: Lucy and Michelle
episodes.plot: As Lucy becomes one with the Infinity Clock, she finds herself floating in a realm of memories. There, she comes to terms with who--or what--Michelle is, and the role the girl played in her past. In the end, they may be the only ones able to save the world.

episodes.title: The Day of Fated Meeting
episodes.plot: Fairy Tail picks up the pieces after their battle with Laxus. When Lucy's told today will be a fateful day for her, she puts all her might into meeting the man who will bring her biggest dreams to fruition - only to realize where she truly belongs.

episodes.title: Special Request: Watch Out for the Guy You Like
episodes.plot: Lovesick Juvia buys a passion potion with hopes to get her favorite icy guy to warm up to her. When the wrong people catch a whiff, the whole guild gets off on the wrong foot! Meanwhile, Lucy loses her cool when she thinks she's a fire wizard's new crush!

episodes.title: Love & Lucky
episodes.plot: Lucy's dad pays a visit to Magnolia to ask his lovely daughter for a favor, but she doesn't buy it. When the trade guild her pop is gunning to join is attacked by burglars, Lucy races to save the day.

episodes.title: Allied Forces, Assemble!
episodes.plot: To defeat the dark guild Oración Seis, Fairy Tail delegates Natsu, Erza, Gray, and Lucy to join members from Blue Pegasus, Lamia Scale, and Cait Shelter in a joint effort. Everyone is stunned, however, when the representative from Cait Shelter arrives: a young girl named Wendy.

episodes.title: Enter the Oración Seis!
episodes.plot: The coalition of conjurers gathers at their meeting place to discuss their plan to stop Oracion Seis. But when the allies are ambushed, the crew get a taste of the evil prowess they're up against!

episodes.title: Maiden of the Sky
episodes.plot: With Erza slowly being poisoned to death, Carla reveals that Wendy's powers as a Sky Dragon Slayer can heal Erza, which sends everyone off to rescue their friends. However, Natsu, Gray, and Carla are inhibited by members of the dark guild Naked Mummy.

episodes.title: The Girl and the Ghost
episodes.plot: Frightened and conflicted, Wendy is coerced into bringing an evil wizard - whom she remembers fondly - back from the brink of death. Meanwhile, Natsu and Gray are sidelined by some monkey business when a goofy guild stands in their way to save Wendy!

episodes.title: Dead Grand Prix
episodes.plot: With Wendy and Carla in tow, Natsu and Gray rush to heal their friend, but they're sidetrack by an attack from a deceptively quick member of Oracion Seis! Rival ice wizards team up in a high-speed battle to put the brakes on Racer.

episodes.title: Darkness
episodes.plot: The sixth member of Oracion Seis finally awakens from his slumber. When Erza is finally back to full strength, she rushes to find Jellal and stop him before he releases the chaotic power of Nirvana!

episodes.title: Celestial Skirmish
episodes.plot: Lucy goes solo against an identity thief who has her own celestial powers - but she can't compare when it comes to the coalition member's compassion for her companions in combat! Nirvana already starts to take effect on the wizards within its radius.

episodes.title: Jellal of Days Gone By
episodes.plot: Angel is defeated and Lucy together with Natsu end up falling down a giant waterfall, where they reunite with Gray, Lyon, and Sherry. Wendy reveals to Carla her past concerning Jellal and how she came to Cait Shelter. Meanwhile, Erza finds an amnesiac Jellal at the site of Nirvana.

episodes.title: March to Destruction
episodes.plot: Erza puts her heart into convincing Jellal to cancel the self-destruction spell, but Brain is two steps ahead of them. When Nirvana morphs into an ancient city on legs and targets an unsuspecting guild, Natsu and Happy fight Cobra to try to stop it!

episodes.title: Super Aerial Battle: Natsu vs. Cobra!
episodes.plot: As the ancient city of Nirvana continues its path towards Cait Shelter, Natsu and Happy take a pounding from Cobra's poisonous strikes. But the power of a true dragon slayer should never be underestimated - as long as Happy can keep him off the ground!

episodes.title: Wizard Saint Jura
episodes.plot: Jura's strength is rock solid as he steps up to shut Brain down. Meanwhile, Natsu and Happy are sick as dogs under the effects of Cobra's poison, and Nirvana's march has the fire wizard floored - unless some Sky magic can fix him!

episodes.title: Your Words
episodes.plot: There's still one Oracion Seis member left standing, and Nirvana doesn't show any signs of stopping! They have to defeat Midnight and a talking staff! Erza and Jellal try their hand at cracking the sorcerer's mirror magic, but things get ugly quick.

episodes.title: Zero
episodes.plot: Erza uses sheer force and battle smarts to see straight through Midnight's illusions in a mind-warping fight to the finish. But when the last of the six generals drops, the guild master's super destructive split personality breaks free!

episodes.title: From Pegasus to Fairies
episodes.plot: As Zero fires on Cait Shelter, Blue Pegasus's ship Christina, held together by Lyon, Sherry, and Ren, destroy one of Nirvana's legs and cause it to miss. Hibiki relays the details of the plan to stop Nirvana: within 20 minutes, the six legs of Nirvana must be destroyed at the same time.

episodes.title: The Power of Feelings
episodes.plot: The coalition coordinates a team attack to end Nirvana's course of destruction. But before they can make their final strike, Natsu faces Zero in a fierce battle to the finish! Will an old enemy get in the way, or lend a helping hand?

episodes.title: I'm with You
episodes.plot: Not even being sent to a land of nothingness can keep the power of the dragon down as Natsu fully unleashes a newfound power! Now the team can attack Nirvana with a unified strike! But what happens when another force comes after their new friends?

episodes.title: A Guild for One
episodes.plot: Agents from the Magic Council dispatched to the site of Nirvana's fall arrest Jellal; when everyone else resists, Erza stops them and urges the officials to take Jellal away, though she is devastated by the outcome.

episodes.title: Call of the Dragon
episodes.plot: The coalition parts ways and Fairy Tail welcomes their newest members to the guild! Then, Gray informs Natsu about a lady who claims she met a dragon recently. With hopes of finding their long lost guardian, two Dragon Slayers end up at a creepy hotel.

episodes.title: Natsu vs. Gray!!
episodes.plot: Duped by his rival and a strange saleswoman, Natsu finds himself in fiery fisticuffs against a very unlikely foe! Erza and Lucy know something's up, but they have some scaly copycats to handle before they can help their friend out of a bind!

episodes.title: Friendship Overcomes the Dead
episodes.plot: With Natsu trapped inside her magic-sapping monstrosity, Daphne flies straight for Fairy Tail! As the guild fights to protect Magnolia from annihilation, Makarov gives Gray the third degree.

episodes.title: A Fairy Tail Wizard
episodes.plot: The only wizard who can defeat the rampaging Dragonoid is inside the Dragonoid. Since Gray's plan didn't pan out like he hoped, Fairy Tail's only hope is to get Natsu fired up enough to get himself out of the hot seat!

episodes.title: Rainbow Cherry Blossoms
episodes.plot: It's cherry blossom season in Magnolia, and Fairy Tail is preparing for a huge celebration. No one's as excited as Lucy, but when she catches a cold on a mission, she finds herself alone during the festivities and reflects on her time in the guild.

episodes.title: Wendy's First Big Job!?
episodes.plot: Wendy takes her first big assignment--one that sends her to the theater where Natsu and the others once performed in a disastrous play. Happy and Freed are assigned to help her out, but a few other wizards can't help but tag along.

episodes.title: 24-Hour Endurance Road Race
episodes.plot: The wizards go head to head as the guild competes in an endurance race where anything goes (except flying magic). Will anyone be able to beat Jet, the reigning champion? And what's the terrible punishment for the loser that Makarov keeps talking about?

episodes.title: Gildarts
episodes.plot: Gildarts--Fairy Tail's strongest wizard--returns from a hundred-year quest that even he couldn't complete. After remembering more peaceful times when Lisanna was still alive, Natsu visits Gildarts and discovers that the wizard has seen a black dragon.

episodes.title: Earth Land
episodes.plot: Mystogan's secret identity is revealed to Wendy and Carla as a powerful magic transports Fairy Tail--along with the rest of Magnolia--to another world. What does this other realm want with the wizards, and how are Happy and Carla involved?

episodes.title: Edolas
episodes.plot: Natsu and the few remaining wizards travel to the world of Edolas in an attempt to rescue the captured city of Magnolia. It's a place where nothing is as it seems and magic is scarce. Plus, there's something strangely familiar about the people there...

episodes.title: Fairy Hunter
episodes.plot: The Fairy Tail in the parallel plane of Edolas is full of guild mates who act the exact opposite of their earth counterparts. Lucy is a tough-as-nails leader, Erza is a vicious enemy of the wizards, and Carla and Happy seem to be worshipped--and feared.

episodes.title: Key of Hope
episodes.plot: Natsu and his team travel to the black market in order to gear up with some magical contraband. There, the scary version of Lucy comes face to face with the normal version of Lucy, who just might be the only person in Edolas who can use magic.

episodes.title: Fireball
episodes.plot: As the kingdom of Edolas gets closer to draining magic from the captured city of Magnolia, Natsu meets a bizarro version of himself--one who's only at home behind the wheel of a car. Meanwhile, Gajeel and his Edolas doppelganger get along swimmingly.

episodes.title: Welcome Home
episodes.plot: Natsu's team arrives in the capital city and discovers that the entire town of Magnolia has been turned into a giant crystal. After Carla helps them come up with a plan, they attempt to infiltrate the palace--with disastrous consequences.

episodes.title: Extalia
episodes.plot: After a terrible betrayal, Lucy, Natsu, and Wendy are imprisoned beneath the palace. Meanwhile, Carla and Happy discover a world of cats just like them. There, they learn the truth about their duty, and their lives are revealed to be full of lies.

episodes.title: Fly, to Our Friends!
episodes.plot: After turning their backs on their homeland, Carla and Happy search for a way to save their friends. On a small farm, they meet some fellow Exceeds who may have more in common with Happy and Carla than the Fairy Tail cats realize.

episodes.title: Code ETD
episodes.plot: Happy and Carla manage to rescue Lucy from the Edolas version of Erza, only to be chased by an army of Exceeds. As the dragon slayers are drained of their power in the dungeons, the king activates Code ETD and starts an unexpected rebellion.

episodes.title: Erza vs. Erza
episodes.plot: The Royal Army's true intentions are revealed! Meanwhile, a few familiar faces show up to save Wendy and Natsu. When the Edolas version of Erza meets Earth's Erza, a fierce, no-holds-barred battle begins.

episodes.title: These Are Lives!!!!
episodes.plot: Natsu, Gray, and Lucy face off against members of the Royal Army in an insane amusement park full of lethal rides and swarms of monsters. Elsewhere, Panther Lily faces off against Gajeel in the sky.

episodes.title: For Pride's Sake, the River of Stars
episodes.plot: When Lucy goes head-to-head with an old man who is able to turn into a giant, tentacled monster, Virgo gives her a new weapon. Meanwhile, Gray fights for the key to the army's destructive weapon.

episodes.title: The Apocalyptic Dragon Chain Cannon
episodes.plot: Wendy and Carla visit Extalia to warn the queen of the cat-filled city's impending doom, but are met with a violent welcome. Natsu and Gray plot to use the Royal Army's own weapons against them--but are captured by Erza.

episodes.title: The Boy Back Then
episodes.plot: As everyone unites to try to stop the Fairy Tail lacrima from crashing into Extalia, Queen Chagot makes a shocking admission and the truth behind the Exceeds is revealed! Will anyone be able to stop the Royal Army's plot?

episodes.title: Dragon Sense
episodes.plot: As Panther Lily recovers from a devastating attack, Erza Knightwalker sends her forces after the Exceeds. The king attacks from within an armored dragon that absorbs magic power. Luckily, there are a few dragon slayers around.

episodes.title: O Living Ones
episodes.plot: Two Erzas fight each other in the ruins of Extalia! The king's dragon armor takes a terrifying new form! And as the Royal Army closes in on Lucy and the others, the Edolas Fairy Tail must decide whose side they're on!

episodes.title: I'm Standing Right Here
episodes.plot: The dragon slayers continue to fight, joining forces in a devastating combo attack. But even if the king is defeated, Mystogan has enacted a plan that will forever change Edolas, and could mean big things for Panther Lilly.

episodes.title: Bye-Bye Edolas
episodes.plot: As all the magic is sucked out of Edolas, the public panics, and three unlikely villains set about trashing the city. It looks like Fairy Tail will finally be transported back to their world--but not everyone will be returning with them.

episodes.title: Lisanna
episodes.plot: The guild finally returns to Earthland--along with a few other surprises. The Exceeds make it their mission to track down all their missing children, Gajeel gets a new partner, and a long-lost guild member makes a shocking return.

episodes.title: He Who Extinguishes Life
episodes.plot: Rebuilding begins in the plane of Edolas as everyone tries to figure out what to do now that there is no magic left in the world. Back in Magnolia, Fairy Tail celebrates the return of Lisanna as the magic council debates the guild's future.

episodes.title: Fairy Tail
episodes.plot: Lucy Heartfilia is an inexpert magician who wants to join the "Fairy Tail" guild. During this first adventure, she meets the fire magician called Natsu Dragneel and his blue and talking cat; Happy.

episodes.title: The Fire Dragon, the Monkey, and the Ox
episodes.plot: As the Magic Council discuss what is to be done about Fairy Tail's destructive behavior Natsu and Happy return to Fairy Tail bringing Lucy along to join the guild. There she is introduced to the other members. While looking for a job they discover that one of the members of the guild, Macao, has gone missing after going on a job to Mt. Hakone. Natsu, Happy and Lucy go off in search of him.

episodes.title: Infiltrate! The Everlue Mansion!
episodes.plot: Lucy has moved into a house in Magnolia where her guild Fairy Tail is located. As Lucy is talking about how great her house is Natsu and Happy barge in, to Lucy's dismay. As she fails to get them to leave she shows them her Celestial spirits before then opening the gate of Canis Minor to form a new contract with the spirit, which she names Plue. After inviting her to join him to make up a team, Natsu presents her with a job to steal a book from the mansion of Duke Everlue. They travel to Shirotsume Town to meet the client who is desperate to get the book. They find ...

episodes.title: Dear Kaby
episodes.plot: Natsu has taken care of the guards employed by Duke Everlue and partially destroyed the mansion in the process. Meanwhile, Lucy and Happy struggle with Duke Everlue himself in an attempt to take the book Fairy Tail has been employed to steal. The history behind the writing of the book was secretly hidden within, which Lucy explains during the fight. However, she is convinced the book contains a greater secret... They defeat Duke Everlue, who's magical tunneling results in the mansion collapsing, and deliver the book to the client. On the way back to Fairy Tail Natsu, ...

episodes.title: The Armoured Wizard
episodes.plot: Natsu, Happy and Lucy have returned to Fairy Tail after finishing their last job. They become bored just hanging around and decide to go on another job especially since Lucy cannot afford to pay the next months rent since they did not get money for the previous job. Whist deciding, Fairy Tail's strongest female wizard, Erza, returns and requests Natsu and Grey to accompany her on a dangerous job against the dark guild Eisenwald. They set off with Lucy and Happy tagging along...

episodes.title: The Fairies in the Wind
episodes.plot: Makarov, master of Fairy Tail, is away at a meeting of local guild masters. Meanwhile, members of the dark guild, Eisenwald, have taken over a train as part of a plot. Its up to Erza, Natsu, Grey, Lucy and Happy to find out what they are planning and stop them. They catch up to the guild at Oshibana station where they reveal their plan to use the speakers in the station to broadcast the Lullaby, a Death Magic flute that kills all who hear it, to the surrounding city. Eisenwald's guild master runs off and Natsu and Grey are sent to stop him. Erza and Lucy defeat the ...

episodes.title: Flame and Wind
episodes.plot: Natsu defeats Kageyama, whom Erza determines has the ability to dispel the wind barrier trapping them inside Oshibana Station. Before she can threaten Kageyama into cooperating, he is gravely wounded by his guildmate Karacka to silence him.

episodes.title: The Strongest Team!!!
episodes.plot: Natsu finally knocks the wind out of Erigor's sails in a scorcher of a battle - but Fairy Tail's strongest team still has a war to fight when the death flute's dark magic plays an evil scale of epic proportions.

episodes.title: Natsu, Eat the Village
episodes.plot: While traveling home with grumbling bellies, the team stumbles upon a deserted village with lots of yummy grub lying around, but Erza's gut tells her something's up. While she investigates, the boys chow on a forest full of odd fungus.

episodes.title: Natsu vs. Erza
episodes.plot: Now that they've made it back to Fairy Tail headquarters, it's time for Erza to answer Natsu's challenge! Before things really get heated, the Guild Council stops by to arrest Erza, but Natsu's not about to let her get away that easily!

episodes.title: Cursed Island
episodes.plot: Natsu, Happy and Lucy tread some seriously troubled waters when they break guild rules to take an S-class job request and end up shipwrecked on the cursed Galuna Island!

episodes.title: Moon Drip
episodes.plot: When the team stumbles upon the infamous demon Deliora frozen in magic ice, cold memories - and a familiar face - are resurrected from Gray's dark past.

episodes.title: Natsu vs. Yuka the Wave User
